ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Fast and very memory-efficient calculation of isotope patterns, subsequent convolution to theoretical envelopes (profiles) plus valley detection and centroidization or intensoid calculation. Batch processing, resolution interpolation, wrapper, adduct calculations and molecular formula parsing. Loos, M., Gerber, C., Corona, F., Hollender, J., Singer, H. (2015) <doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941>.

Fast and very memory-efficient calculation of isotope patterns, subsequent convolution to theoretical envelopes (profiles) plus valley detection and centroidization or intensoid calculation. Batch processing, resolution interpolation, wrapper, adduct calculations and molecular formula parsing. Loos, M., Gerber, C., Corona, F., Hollender, J., Singer, H. (2015) <doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941>.

name: r-envipat

about.summary: Fast and very memory-efficient calculation of isotope patterns, subsequent convolution to theoretical envelopes (profiles) plus valley detection and centroidization or intensoid calculation. Batch processing, resolution interpolation, wrapper, adduct calculations and molecular formula parsing. Loos, M., Gerber, C., Corona, F., Hollender, J., Singer, H. (2015) <doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941>.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.8" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-envipat
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/enviPat_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/enviPat/enviPat_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ec945543f005a188d9fdfcbb48a9e66a2ec9fb9e0a432e3ceea2218266860482

build:
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}          # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('enviPat')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('enviPat')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.envipat.eawag.ch/, http://pubs.acs.org/doi/abs/10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Fast and very memory-efficient calculation of isotope patterns, subsequent convolution to theoretical envelopes (profiles) plus valley detection and centroidization or intensoid calculation. Batch processing, resolution interpolation, wrapper, adduct calculations and molecular formula parsing. Loos, M., 
    Gerber, C., Corona, F., Hollender, J., Singer, H. (2015) <doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941>.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: enviPat
# Type: Package
# Title: Isotope Pattern, Profile and Centroid Calculation for Mass Spectrometry
# Version: 2.4
# Date: 2019-03-18
# Author: Martin Loos, Christian Gerber
# Maintainer: Martin Loos <mloos@envibee.ch>
# Description: Fast and very memory-efficient calculation of isotope patterns, subsequent convolution to theoretical envelopes (profiles) plus valley detection and centroidization or intensoid calculation. Batch processing, resolution interpolation, wrapper, adduct calculations and molecular formula parsing. Loos, M., Gerber, C., Corona, F., Hollender, J., Singer, H. (2015) <doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941>.
# License: GPL-2
# BugReports: https://github.com/blosloos/enviPat/issues
# URL: http://www.envipat.eawag.ch/, http://pubs.acs.org/doi/abs/10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2019-04-07 17:07:25 UTC; mloos
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-04-07 22:12:56 UTC

about.summary: Fast and very memory-efficient calculation of isotope patterns, subsequent convolution to theoretical envelopes (profiles) plus valley detection and centroidization or intensoid calculation. Batch processing, resolution interpolation, wrapper, adduct calculations and molecular formula parsing. Loos, M., Gerber, C., Corona, F., Hollender, J., Singer, H. (2015) <doi:10.1021/acs.analchem.5b00941>.
